thread.title: Sean Payton Postgame Press Conference Following Win Over Cowboys
thread.title_full: Sean Payton Postgame Press Conference Following Win Over Cowboys

author: Steve Peloquin
title: Sean Payton Postgame Press Conference Following Win Over Cowboys
text:
Sean Payton Postgame Press Conference Following Win Over Cowboys By Steve Peloquin October 5, 2015 4:49 AM (Photo by Chris Graythen/Getty Images) 

New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton met with media members on Sunday night, following his teamâ€™s 26-20 victory over the Dallas Cowboys at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans, La. 
The overtime win, the first triumph of the year for the Saints, improved their record to 1-3 on the season. 
The Saints return to action next Sunday, when they travel to Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to take on the Eagles.
